title: Lost Password
body:
I lost my password about 4 months ago for PBE
Been trying to change it since. But it never worked. 
Any help is appreciated

replies.body: Our account team can help with recovering your account by submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), in case the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide is unsuccessful.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
